name: Chef
description: Deploy to Chef environments by editing environment attributes
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Chef Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Chef subscription service connection.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Chef Environment to be used for Deployment. The attributes of that environment will be edited.

inputs.name: Attributes
inputs.label: Environment Attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the value of the leaf node attribute(s) to be updated. Example. { "default_attributes.connectionString" : "$(connectionString)", "override_attributes.buildLocation" : "https://sample.blob.core.windows.net/build" }. Task fails if the leaf node does not exist.

inputs.name: chefWaitTime
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: The amount of time (in minutes) to wait for this task to complete. Default value: 30 minutes

instanceNameFormat: Deploy to chef by editing environment attributes of Chef subscription $(ChefServer)
